articles.title: Call of Duty: Warzone gets Samoyed dog skin, artist says it’s plagiarized
articles.description: Raven Software’s latest update for Call of Duty: Warzone as part of season 4 brings the Terminator and a cute Samoyed skin to the battle royale game. But an artist says Activision and Raven stole their artwork, with contacting or compensating them.
articles.content: Activisions latest update for Call of Duty: Warzone will bring the Terminator both Arnold Schwarzeneggers T-800 and Robert Patricks T-1000 to the battle royale-style shooter. Also coming to season 4 … [+2555 chars]

articles.author: Owen S. Good
articles.title: Will Smith apologizes again for slapping Chris Rock in YouTube video
articles.description: In a six-minute video posted July 29, 2022, Will Smith apologized to Chris Rock, Rock’s family, and others for slapping comedian at the Academy Awards on March 27, 2022, after Rock made a joke at the expense of Smith’s wife, Jada Pinkett-Smith.
articles.content: Im trying to be remorseful without being ashamed of myself, says the Fresh Prince

articles.author: Austen Goslin
articles.title: Tomb Raider could get a new movie reboot after MGM loses rights
articles.description: MGM’s 2018 Tomb Raider movie will be its last. The studio lost the rights to the series earlier this year when it didn’t greenlight a sequel, leading to a bidding war between other studios.
articles.content: The Tomb Raider film rights are on the move again. After not making a new entry in the franchise since 2018, MGM has lost the Tomb Raider license, leading the rest of Hollywood into a bidding war for… [+1826 chars]

articles.title: Analogue Pocket firmware update 1.1 is here: No jailbreak yet
articles.description: Analogue released version 1.1 of the Pocket handheld’s firmware, adding new savestate features, PS5 DualSense support, and openFPGA — but no jailbreak yet.

articles.author: Ana Diaz
articles.title: Genshin Impact Sumeru teaser reveals Alhaitham, Dehya, Cyno, and more
articles.description: Hoyoverse released a new teaser showing more content from the upcoming Dendro-inspired region called Sumeru. The trailer showed characters official revealed characters like Alhaitham, Dehya, Cyno, Nilou, and Nahida.
articles.content: Trailer shows six characters from the games new Sumeru region

articles.title: Bernard Cribbins helped remind the world Doctor Who is about kindness

articles.author: Austen Goslin
articles.title: Marilyn Monroe’s Netflix biopic, Blonde, leans into tragedy in trailer
articles.description: Netflix’s Blonde, a biopic about Marilyn Monroe staring Ana de Armas, has its first trailer and lets the star tell her own, slightly fictionalized, story about her tragic life.
articles.content: Ana de Armas stars as Norma Jean herself
